title: dhru9
author: dhru9
content: Coin Bureau - Solona and Near protocol will take me to the moon. This what he talks on his recent video and even added them to his protflioCoin bureau crypto portfolio 2022 Both are layer 1 solution and they're going to pump hard in the next bull run. This what I think as well.'The Coin Bureau - Solona and Near protocol will take me to the moon'' CoinBureau.Do you think he is right? What do you do about it?

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: I would not trust the judgement from some service, it could be a common manipulation, as youtube-influencers do. In any case, whether he is right or wrong, you can't make a decision based on his judgments. By the way, the service has some problems with data updates. Shows that the capitalization is 1.85 trillion, when it has long been below such values. If their portfolio is as up-to-date as their market data, then you can conclude that you should not trust this service.
